mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lagarto.customer (iboard, board_cd, title, ctnt, iuser, rating, secretYn) VALUES (${iboard}, ${board_cd}, #{title}, #{ctnt}, ${iuser}, ${rating}, #{secretYn})
mapper.select:
SELECT A.* , B.nickname, C.title AS productTitle, C.iboard FROM lagarto.customer A INNER JOIN lagarto.lagarto_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN lagarto.auction C ON A.product_cd = C.iboard WHERE A.board_cd = ${board_cd} AND A.isdel = 0
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND A.ctnt LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND B.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND ( A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR A.ctnt LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR B.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY A.iboard DESC LIMIT #{paginationInfo.firstRecordIndex}, #{recordsPerPage}

SELECT A.*, B.nickname, C.board_nm, D.title AS productTitle FROM lagarto.customer A LEFT JOIN lagarto.lagarto_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN lagarto.customer_board_type C ON A.board_cd = C.board_cd LEFT JOIN lagarto.auction D ON A.product_cd = D.iboard WHERE A.iboard = ${iboard}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lagarto.customer WHERE isdel = 0 AND board_cd = ${board_cd}
